creator: NEXTERS GLOBAL LTD
descriptionHtml:
Join a group of brave explorers and help uncover the mystery of the Pyramid, a mystical artifact from ages past! You'll need to settle in first, though. Explore the island, find hidden treasure, and don't forget to upgrade and decorate your farm! Be sure to befriend the island residents so they can help you in your adventures!

Game Features

● A dynamic story. Complete quests and let the story unfold before you!
● A farm with a huge variety of structures. Build everything you need to survive!
● Hidden treasures all over the island. Try to find them all!
● A wide selection of decorations for your farm. Stand out from the crowd!
● Deliveries for island residents. Trade resources and lend a helping hand!
● Frequent updates with special events. Don't miss out on the fun!
● Colorful graphics and pleasant visual effects. Your adventure will be breathtaking!
● Everything you find on the island is yours for the taking! Enjoy complete freedom of exploration!

The island awaits! The Pyramid will only unveil its secrets to the most inquisitive and persevering explorers!
descriptionShort: Welcome to our mysterious island, full of secrets from a long-lost civilization!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to our mysterious island, replete with secrets from a long-lost civilization!

New improvements already in-game! Check out what’s new!

- New dynamic story
- Added new charismatic characters
- Some bug fixes and improvements.

Have fun!

descriptionShort: Welcome to our mysterious island, full of secrets from a long-lost civilization!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Maintenance update
Small fixes and improvements: swept up fallen leaves, smoothed out the dunes' edges, and double-checked vine durability.
We hope you have a bountiful harvest and wish you many wonderful findings, brave explorer! If you ever need help, send us a homing seagull at support@nexters.zendesk.com

descriptionShort: Welcome to our mysterious island, full of secrets from a long-lost civilization!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our game just keeps getting better!

Story Development
The story of the pyramid continues! Discover new lands and learn more.

Dig Site
Complete a minigame once every few hours to farm resources from the new Dig Site.

New Daily Quests
Just keep playing as usual and earn rewards along the way!

Ambassador
The Royal Research League ambassador would like to get along with the island’s residents. He always has some supplies and news to offer.

See all these additions and improvements for yourself!

descriptionShort: Welcome to our mysterious island, full of secrets from a long-lost civilization!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New horizons and opportunities!

The story continues
The story of the pyramid continues! Explore new lands and uncover their secrets.

New rewards
Daily quests and player's bonus awarded for time spent in the game.

Minigame
Find valuable resources at the Dig Site!

Captain Cyrus Nemo and Ambassador Arnold
The Royal Research League has deployed its representatives on the island. Getting along with them will benefit both parties!

We also updated SFX and fixed a few bugs.

descriptionShort: Welcome to our mysterious island, full of secrets from a long-lost civilization!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A Surge of Mystery and Improvements!

The story goes on
The story of the mysterious pyramid continues! Meet dinosaurs in the flesh!

Halloween
As the spookiest night approaches, Albert and Diana want to share a tale from their past.

Konnichiwa
Chibi Island is now available in Japanese!

Improved quest list
Tap a construction quest to view all resources required for the current building stage.

Minor improvements
Some bug fixes and improvements for all the mystery hunters out there!

descriptionShort: Welcome to our mysterious island, full of secrets from a long-lost civilization!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The winter is getting colder, and the Chibi Island story is getting more intense!

New chapter
Play and find out how the events unfold!

Technical fixes
Improved performance and ironed out some minor flaws to ensure a flawless experience for all adventurers out there.

Uncover the new mysteries!

● Everything you find on the island is yours for the taking! Enjoy complete freedom of exploration!

The island awaits! The Pyramid will only unveil its secrets to the most inquisitive and persevering explorers!
descriptionShort: Welcome to our mysterious island, full of secrets from a long-lost civilization!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Snow is melting, hearts are melting!

The story continues
As the story of the mysterious pyramid unfolds, Weiss' new device should make it easy enough to find the next Spark. Will everything go according to plan?

Romantic event
Love can work miracles, as David's story shows so clearly. Find out how he helped out two lovebirds and supported an entire town!

We've also fixed some bugs and introduced some gameplay improvements to make sure nothing distracts you from the riddles and mysteries.

title: Chibi Island

creator: NEXTERS GLOBAL LTD
descriptionHtml:
Join a group of brave explorers and help uncover the mystery of the Pyramid, a mystical artifact from ages past! You'll need to settle in first, though. Explore the island, find hidden treasure, and don't forget to upgrade and decorate your farm! Be sure to befriend the island residents so they can help you in your adventures!

Game Features

● A dynamic story. Complete quests and let the story unfold before you!
● A farm with a huge variety of structures. Build everything you need to survive!
● Hidden treasures all over the island. Try to find them all!
● A wide selection of decorations for your farm. Stand out from the crowd!
● Deliveries for island residents. Trade resources and lend a helping hand!
● Frequent updates with special events. Don't miss out on the fun!
● Colorful graphics and pleasant visual effects. Your adventure will be breathtaking!
● Everything you find on the island is yours for the taking! Enjoy complete freedom of exploration!

The island awaits! The Pyramid will only unveil its secrets to the most inquisitive and persevering explorers!

descriptionShort: Welcome to our mysterious island, full of secrets from a long-lost civilization!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
An update for both the most dedicated players and everyone else!

Reward Marathon
Explore the island and complete orders for the Royal Research League to earn tokens! Use the tokens to unlock valuable items and even new decorations for your domain!

Explosive Help
Someone scattered dynamite all around the jungle. Keep your eyes open so you can easily tackle obstacles blocking your path!

Other
Some bug fixes and general improvements.

Enjoy the game!

title: Chibi Island

creator: NEXTERS GLOBAL LTD
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Chibi island, a fascinating farming adventure game where you can explore a mysterious island, harvest crops, get resources, craft and build your farm town.

Chibi Island is not just a farm simulation or village farming game: it’s a thrilling jungle adventure, where you explore lost lands and discover ancient mysteries, solve puzzles and also enjoy a great mission that only you can complete! Dip in the exciting world of mysteries - the island adventure is already waiting for you!

So, what’s now? Let’s start our journey to the paradise island! Join a group of brave explorers and help uncover the mystery of the Pyramid, a mystical artifact from ages past! You'll need to settle in first, though. Explore the jungle island, find the hidden treasure, and don't forget to upgrade and decorate your farm town! Be sure to befriend the island residents so they can help you in your adventures!

Chibi Island Features:

📖 A dynamic story. What secrets does this paradise island have? Complete quests on your way through these mysterious lands and let the story unfold before you!
🌱A farm with a huge variety of structures. Farm, grow crops, gather a harvest and raise farm animals to trade with island residents. Turn your surroundings into a farm village and build everything you need to survive!
🏺 Hidden treasures all over the island. Discover ancient treasures and artifacts to exchange them for resources that will help you to build and decorate your farm town. Try to find them all!
⛲ A wide selection of decorations. Design your farmland with all kinds of beautiful decorations. Stand out from the crowd!
⛵Trading Deliveries for island residents. Trade resources and lend a helping hand! Сomplete orders to earn money and experience points.
🔍 Everything you find on the island is yours for the taking! Enjoy complete freedom of exploration! Discover the jungle island with the fearless Chibi explorers and help them solve puzzles along the way.

Do you want to solve the mystery of the ancient ruins on the paradise island full of dangers and wicked savages? The web of secrets and mysteries entangles every cave on the treasure island. Sometimes it seems that another part of the world is reflected here in the sunshine, surrounded by tropical jungle... Move inland and explore lost civilization with brave Chibi adventurers! Come and help them!

The island awaits! The Pyramid will only unveil its secrets to the most inquisitive and persevering explorers!
descriptionShort: Build your farm village on a mysterious island. Enjoy paradise jungle adventures

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are continuing to improve our game; check out the latest features!
- Decoration collections -
The decoration shop has been remade from scratch! New decorations have been grouped into themed sets.
- Piggy Bank -
Complete deliveries and get gems! Each completed delivery adds gems to the Piggy Bank so you can claim them later.
- The Fruit Paradise Festival -
Complete festival quests and earn special tickets that can be exchanged for new island decorations!

Chibi Island development team

descriptionShort: Build your farm village on a mysterious island. Enjoy paradise jungle adventures

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
News from the explorers' world!

Energy Cube
The ongoing efforts at the Dig Site have finally paid off! Now that the mysterious artifact known as the Energy Cube has been discovered, you can use it to obtain unique decorations and valuable resources.

General improvements
Bug fixes and improvements for a more enjoyable experience when exploring the island.

Ancient secrets await!

Event Streak

Time goes by

See you, brave explorers!

descriptionShort: Build your farm village on a mysterious island. Enjoy paradise jungle adventures

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Many new things for all players!

Game Events
Get into the game daily to always stay up-to-date.

Easter?..
The Easter celebrations got delayed because of the storm, but it won't spoil the festivities!

New Faces
Build new homes and decorations to attract more residents.

Aquatic Collection
Give your island a new look and don't let the summer go with some new decorations!

Storms of Life
The ocean runs high, but we've fixed everything that could go wrong.

Have fun!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A game update is headed your way!

Teeming with Life
Now your residents are real chibis you can observe!

The More, The Merrier
The more chibis on your island, the more goods you can produce and exchange.

Island Popularity Rating
Which island is the most popular with the chibis? Push your island up the ranks and claim the top spot!

Name and Profile Picture
Show off your personality to other players!

New Arrivals at the Store
Secret Promos and the Black Friday Sale!

Also, some minor fixes.

descriptionShort: Build your farm village on a mysterious island. Enjoy paradise jungle adventures

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fresh update, coming through!

Logistics Expansion
Warehouse now receives delivery orders directly from the residents of the island! Complete these orders and the grateful residents will pay you back with gold and tools. Oh, and don’t forget to swing by the Merchant Harbor to check out Captain Nemo’s orders — we’ve made some changes there, too.

Have Fun Every Day
A series of exciting new events is about to start — check in daily so you don’t miss out!

Never a dull day on the island!

Fresh update, coming through!

Logistics Expansion
Warehouse now receives delivery orders directly from the residents of the island! Complete these orders and the grateful residents will pay you back with gold and tools. Oh, and don’t forget to swing by the Merchant Harbor to check out Captain Nemo’s orders — we’ve made some changes there, too.

Have Fun Every Day
A series of exciting new events is about to start — check in daily so you don’t miss out!

Never a dull day on the island!

title: Chibi Island: Farm & Adventure

creator: NEXTERS GLOBAL LTD
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Chibi island, a fascinating farming adventure game where you can explore a mysterious island, harvest crops, get resources, craft and build your farm town.

Chibi Island is not just a farm simulation or village farming game: it’s a thrilling jungle adventure, where you explore lost lands and discover ancient mysteries, solve puzzles and also enjoy a great mission that only you can complete! Dip in the exciting world of mysteries - the island adventure is already waiting for you!

So, what’s now? Let’s start our journey to the paradise island! Join a group of brave explorers and help uncover the mystery of the Pyramid, a mystical artifact from ages past! You'll need to settle in first, though. Explore the jungle island, find the hidden treasure, and don't forget to upgrade and decorate your farm town! Be sure to befriend the island residents so they can help you in your adventures!

Chibi Island Features:

📖 A dynamic story. What secrets does this paradise island have? Complete quests on your way through these mysterious lands and let the story unfold before you!
🌱A farm with a huge variety of structures. Farm, grow crops, gather a harvest and raise farm animals to trade with island residents. Turn your surroundings into a farm village and build everything you need to survive!
🏺 Hidden treasures all over the island. Discover ancient treasures and artifacts to exchange them for resources that will help you to build and decorate your farm town. Try to find them all!
⛲ A wide selection of decorations. Design your farmland with all kinds of beautiful decorations. Stand out from the crowd!
⛵Trading Deliveries for island residents. Trade resources and lend a helping hand! Сomplete orders to earn money and experience points.
🔍 Everything you find on the island is yours for the taking! Enjoy complete freedom of exploration! Discover the jungle island with the fearless Chibi explorers and help them solve puzzles along the way.

Do you want to solve the mystery of the ancient ruins on the paradise island full of dangers and wicked savages? The web of secrets and mysteries entangles every cave on the treasure island. Sometimes it seems that another part of the world is reflected here in the sunshine, surrounded by tropical jungle... Move inland and explore lost civilization with brave Chibi adventurers! Come and help them!

The island awaits! The Pyramid will only unveil its secrets to the most inquisitive and persevering explorers!
descriptionShort: Build your farm village on a mysterious island. Enjoy paradise jungle adventures

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fresh update, coming through!

Logistics Expansion
Warehouse now receives delivery orders directly from the residents of the island! Complete these orders and the grateful residents will pay you back with gold and tools. Oh, and don’t forget to swing by the Merchant Harbor to check out Captain Nemo’s orders — we’ve made some changes there, too.

Have Fun Every Day
A series of exciting new events is about to start — check in daily so you don’t miss out!

Never a dull day on the island!

descriptionShort: Build your farm village on a mysterious island. Enjoy paradise jungle adventures

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Progressive update!

More Energy
Training has expanded the heroes’ energy pools!

For Centuries
The heroes have gotten better at construction! Farm buildings no longer break.

Tireless Toil
Intervals between Digs have been reduced.

Bucketful
The locals have gotten the hang of using the Well and are getting more Water from it.

Creative Freedom
Place as many decorations from the shop as you like. Check out the new Amusement Park collection as well!

Make your island unique!

title: Chibi Island: Farm & Adventure
